SteamOverlay.Caption: Steam Overlay
SteamOverlay.FixAreYouSure:

Sinon, le hook restera dans votre systÃ¨me, et aprÃ¨s une nouvelle installation du jeu, vous ne pourrez plus le lancer. Vous pouvez annuler les modifications dans le lanceur ou manuellement en exÃ©cutant Memoria.SteamFix.exe dans le dossier du jeu.

GameLocation.Title: Game Directory
GameLocation.ConfigurationDescription: Uses the information stored in the configuration file.
GameLocation.SteamRegistryDescription: Retrieves information from Windows registry, using data from Steam.
GameLocation.UserDescription: Allows you to manually select the directory to which you have installed the game.

WorkingLocation.Title: Working Directory
WorkingLocation.Description: The directory to store the results of the application.
WorkingLocation.ConfigurationDescription: Uses the information stored in the configuration file.
WorkingLocation.UserDescription: Allows you to manually select a working directory.

TextEncoding.Title: Encoding
TextEncoding.Description: Encoding for unpacking and packing the game text.
TextEncoding.NewDescription: Initializes the standard encoding based on the Windows-1252 encoding.
TextEncoding.WorkingLocationDescription: Reads the encoding from the working directory.
